about_the_game:
Welcome to the very first version of Index: Purger demo. It will be updated in future and will serve as a healthy replacement to "Early Access". and stay tuned!



Current Content of Demo [v1.0]:
- The Get-Inn Mall Defense mission.
- 22 weapons to choose from.
- 3 medical items.
- 8 drugs. Meth update came true!
- A ton of various perk, some of which are truly unique like "Engineer" and "Mystery".
- Perfectly balanced loadout economy.
- Unhinged demo start/end dialogs.



And also... I didn't cut the "unused" levels, idk, maybe you'd like to check it out with console.

Thanks for reading this short description of demo.

Thanks to ostap_bender for throughout support of this game during early development period and for this Steam page as well.

The game is still in development. Features and screenshots listed here are subject to change.

short_description: Step into the world of Index-0, and experience a thrill-fueled mercenary life like no other! With fast-paced, chaotic scenarios, you'll need to keep your wits about you to stay in the game. Make use of the equipment and perks at your disposal, and create your own unique style to control the chaos.
